metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5857 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Downloads in Google Chrome prior to119.0.6045.105 allowed a remote attacker to potentially execute arbitrarycode via a malicious file. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
